item.title: A hacker walks away with $47M legally while a CISO is convicted for doing his job
item.description: A Modern “Crime and Punishment” interpretation - Joe Sullivan and Avraham Eisenberg. News headline #1: Oct 5th 2022 Former Chief Security Officer Of Uber Convicted Of Federal Charges For Covering Up Data Breach Involving Millions Of Uber User Records News Headline #2: Oct 15th 2022 Hacker behind the Mango Markets exploit keeps $47M and returns $67M to the DeFi platform after a Mango community vote; he claims his actions were legal
